channel.title: [508] Accounts automatically reset! [HELP, URGENT]!
channel.description: I have berky-scape source, it is a 508. I am currently hosting it as an online server, and people's acounts automatically get reset for no reason. Has anybody got this source and know how to fix or know how to fiz?? This is urgent, I am loosing all of my players because of it. Please reply ASAP with an answer of help me on msn: skillscape_servers@hotmail.com

item.title: [508] Accounts automatically reset! [HELP, URGENT]!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

so the server does’nt save accounts? but people did do savebackup, just not b4 logging out. can you add my msn?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Accounts automatically reset! [HELP, URGENT]!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

They need to do ::save before logging out

I reconmend posting it somewhere on the Server, may I say close to the Logout Button?

Read full topic
